description.label: Description
description.value:
You have trained your mind to be an impenetrable bulwark.

You may add your Willpower Bonus to your total Magical Endurance for each level of Fortified Mind. If your Willpower Bonus increases then the amount of Magical Endurance Fortified Mind provides also increases.

Also the amount of Magical Endurance that is recovered every hour is increased by one for everytime you've taken Fortified Mind.

tests.label: Tests
tests.value: Any tests to resist mind probing and reading
